Description.Text: Guests should collect apartments keys at Oficina alquileres Peñiscola located in C/Irta 3 Edificio Forner. Telephone: +34 964482065. Check-in from Mondays to Saturdays is from 5 pm to 8 pm and Sundays from 10 am to 1 pm. In case clients arrive outside the indicated timetable, they are asked to please contact their travel agency a minimum of 3 days before in order to inform the apartments. Direct payment of an extra surcharge will be required for later arrival times. If there is no late arrival confirmed with the apartments and travel agency then key pick up may not be possible. Arrival cleaning applies. Towels and sheets are not included, but there is the possibility to rent sheets per sheet/week (locally payable). Use of the swimming pool requires a direct payment per apartment per week (open in summer, guests should ask about the timetable). A cash deposit is obligatory.
The detached holiday homes each have 2 or 3 floors, with one apartment per floor.
